tasks.name: Local Plan
tasks.description: Municipal Strategic Statement lookup using comprehensive LGA/suburb mapping table
tasks.note: getLocalPlan function created with 50+ Victorian council mappings covering Melbourne metro and regional areas with 19+ comprehensive unit tests

tasks.name: Planning Overlays
tasks.description: From Vicmap Planning plan_overlay WFS layer - includes Heritage (HO), Design & Development (DDO), Vegetation Protection (VPO), Significant Landscape (SLO), Development Plan (DPO), Development Contributions (DCPO), etc.
tasks.note: Automatically fetched and deduplicated. Example: Found 9 unique overlays including HO485, HO109, VPO1, VPO2, DDO1, DDO2, DPO3, SLO1, DCPO1

tasks.name: Planning Scheme
tasks.description: Constructed from LGA name (e.g., 'Boroondara Planning Scheme')
tasks.note: Retrieved from Vicmap Planning WFS data

tasks.name: Regional Plan
tasks.description: Derived from LGA - Plan Melbourne 2017-2050 for Greater Melbourne LGAs
tasks.note: Automatically determined based on LGA location

tasks.name: Land Use
tasks.description: Inferred from planning zone code (Residential, Commercial, Industrial, etc.)
tasks.note: Derived from Vicmap Planning zone classification

tasks.name: Zone Description
tasks.description: From Vicmap Planning plan_zone WFS layer
tasks.note: Includes zone code, description, and schedule number (e.g., 'TRANSPORT ZONE 2 - PRINCIPAL ROAD NETWORK - Schedule 7151')

tasks.name: Zone Code
tasks.description: From Vicmap Planning plan_zone WFS layer
tasks.note: Just zone code, i.e GRZ2

tasks.name: Heritage Overlays
tasks.description: Extracted from planning overlays - specifically HO (Heritage Overlay) codes
tasks.note: Automatically filtered from overlay data. Example: HO485, HO109

tasks.name: Zone Precinct
tasks.description: Derived from specific overlay combinations - analyzes planning overlay patterns to determine precinct classification
tasks.note: getZonePrecinct function created with 6 precinct types (Heritage, Design & Development, Environmental, Mixed Use, Activity Centre, Special Use) with 24+ comprehensive unit tests

tasks.name: Character
tasks.description: Uses Neighbourhood Character Overlay (NCO) and Significant Landscape Overlay (SLO) from plan_overlay WFS
tasks.note: getCharacterData module created with significance analysis and planning recommendations

tasks.name: Biodiversity
tasks.description: Uses flora and fauna info from vba wfs usual normal link

tasks.name: Coastal Hazards
tasks.description: Uses Land Subject to Inundation Overlay (LSIO) and Special Building Overlay (SBO) from plan_overlay WFS, plus coastal area detection
tasks.note: getCoastalHazardData module created with risk analysis for coastal properties

tasks.name: Waterways & Wetlands
tasks.description: Uses Floodway Overlay (FO), Public Acquisition Overlay (PAO), and Environmental Significance Overlay (ESO) from plan_overlay WFS to identify waterway buffers
tasks.note: getWaterwayData module created with waterway proximity and protection requirements

tasks.name: Bushfire Risk
tasks.description: Looks good ish dont know about the actual analysis functionality but for the most part is fine

tasks.name: Steep Land
tasks.description: Landslide risk - Uses Landslip Overlay (LSO) and Erosion Management Overlay (EMO) from plan_overlay WFS
tasks.note: getSteepLandData module created with geotechnical risk analysis and slope stability recommendations

tasks.name: Noise Pollution
tasks.description: Got the data ready just need AI to collate when Claude is done cooling down

tasks.name: Odours
tasks.description: Demo odour analysis using different techniques, will see how it works in practice, will possibly need to tweak analysis functions

tasks.name: Sewer
tasks.description: Uses Melbourne Water sewerage network main pipelines GeoJSON data. Calculates distance to nearest pipeline and determines if property has sewage connection (within 50m threshold).
tasks.note: Implementation complete with point-to-LineString/MultiLineString distance calculations

tasks.name: Water
tasks.description: Currently returns null for all because don't have YVW permissions fix later on after MVP
tasks.note: getWaterData module created with multi-provider support (YVW, SEW, CWW), 56 unit tests covering service area detection, WFS queries, and distance analysis. Includes comprehensive error handling for API restrictions.

tasks.name: Stormwater
tasks.description: Uses Melbourne Water drainage catchments (3,409 polygons) and Vicmap retarding basins (1,538 features) WFS. Identifies property's drainage catchment and nearby flood retention infrastructure. Analyzes stormwater risk level based on basin proximity and capacity.
tasks.note: getStormwaterData module created with 51 tests (38 unit, 13 integration). Implements intelligent risk assessment (LOW/MODERATE/HIGH/VERY_HIGH) with context-aware recommendations. Includes filesystem caching for performance.
